code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DownloadForm=()=>{const[url,setUrl]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleDownload=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setMessage('');try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/download',{youtube_url:url});setMessage(response.data.message);}catch(error){setMessage(error.response.data.error||'An error occurred');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleDownload,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter YouTube URL",value:url,onChange:e=>setUrl(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Download Audio"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message})]});};export default DownloadForm;
